summary: Initial talk on technologies and frameworks we are going to use. At this point we are on a experimentational phase. We will try to make a simple working Docker build with Next.js, Typescript, MongoDB and Mongoose
points: Technologies and Frameworks to be used
Research and Study how to Docker
Catch up with Typescritp and Next.js - Thiago
actions: Experiment with the decided stack and try to make it work before advance

blockers.blocker: Auth error when connecting mongo and mongo-express on docker
solutions: Using default values for everything on the dockering process of mongo and mongo-express. Not ideal, but it's working.

Adding the env variable : - ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_URL=mongodb://root:1234@mongo:27017/ 
Matching the login, password and port => mongodb://ADMIN_LOGIN:ADMIN_PASS@mongo:PORT/

solutions: It is actually a bug on docker, as shown on the issues link.
In short, there should be a way to communicate the files on the docker image to the local files.
Workarounds this issue were too messy or hard to understand
Decided to keep going with NextJS dev running out of the container for practicity
